contentList.content: *Say you're looking for a Phoenix, a flexible support focused on simultaneously buffing allies and debuffing enemies.
*Say you're looking for an Arsonist, a pyromaniac hell-bent on setting the battlefield ablaze.
*Say you're looking for a Scorcher, a gifted fire mage specialising in devastating damage-over-time effects.
*Say you're looking for an Infernal, a bulky hybrid damager with a penchant for pyrokinesis.
*Say you're looking for a Deathlord, a warrior beyond death who feasts on the life force of others.
*Say you're looking for a Bloodtide, a master of sanguimancy who sacrifices vitality to inflict pain onto others.
*Say you're looking for a Hexen, a witch armed with a plethora of powerful buffs and debuffs.
*Say you're looking for a Gravecaller, a necromancer able to raise the undead to do their bidding.
*Say you're looking for a Terramancer, a stone mage able to manipulate the fabric of the earth.
*Say you're looking for a Sentinel, an impenetrable warrior who is tough as steel.
*Say you're looking for a Grovetender, a preserver of nature who nourishes allies by commanding plant life.
*Say you're looking for a Plague, a wickedly-cruel poison mage excelling in deadly concoctions.
*Say you're looking for a Windweaver, a maestro of the winds who keeps their foes afar.
*Say you're looking for a Thunderlord, a warrior blessed with a lightning-charged hammer.
*Say you're looking for an Electromancer, a maniacal mage able to fork electricity across the battlefield.
*Say you're looking for a Tempest, a mage able to manipulate the atmosphere to conjure storms and cloud-based surfaces.
*Say you're looking for an Icevein, a cryomancer who keeps their foes frozen in place.
*Say you're looking for an Atlantean, a deep sea warrior armed with a water-infused trident.
*Say you're looking for a Tidecaller, a hydro mage gifted with the ability to manipulate the seas.
*Say you're looking for a Frostsworn, a frost paladin specialising in Magic Armour effects.
*Say you're looking for an Umbra, an assassin who switches between damage types to kill their mark.
*Say you're looking for a Spectre, a practioner of forbidden soul magic who blurs the line between life and death.
*Say you're looking for a Tracker, an expert hunter with a trusty Animal Companion by their side.
*Say you're looking for a Nightcloak, an assassin who dips in and out of visibility to unleash a flurry of deadly strikes.
*Say you're looking for a Constellationist, a wizard that borrows their power from the celestial world to wield as they see fit.
*Say you're looking for an Astronomer, a wizard who manipulates aspects of the sun and moon to buff and debuff whoever they desire.
*Say you're looking for a Beserker, an insane warrior motivated by their unquenchable fury and strength in battle.
*Say you're looking for a Chronomancer, an extraordinary mage with limited control over time and space itself.
*Say you're looking for a Trickster, someone adept at making mischief and magic wherever they turn.
*Say you're looking for a Valkyrie, a true warrior and feared chooser of the slain.
*Say you're looking for a Mirage, a mage channeling chaos and illusion under the desert sun.
*Say you're looking for a Blacksmith, a warrior who can smash enemies with a hammer and repair your gear all the same.
*Say you're looking for a Wyldfae, a mage in harmony with Mother Nature and dominion over flora and fauna.
*Say you're looking for a Succubus, a demon well versed in the timeless arts of romance and seduction.
*Say you're looking for a Vampire, a terrifying warrior that draws power and sustenance from the blood of their enemies.
*Say you're looking for a Cryomancer, a mage adept at strengthening themself with ice and freezing enemies.
*Say you're looking for a Priest, a true support executing the will of the Divine.
*Say you're looking for a Monk, an unarmed warrior that supports allies and brings down wrath on foes.
*Say you're looking for a Paladin, a warrior of retribution capable of defending allies and dealing justice.
*Say you're looking for a Deathknight, a warrior of darkness who can inflict great curses to enemies.
*Say you're looking for a Druid, a supportive mage whose healing is only outmatched by their versatility.
*Say you're looking for a Shaman, a wicked witch that excels at debilitating their opponents.
*Say you're looking for an Arcanist, a mage capable of controlling the battlefield with flashy magic.
*Say you're looking for an Eldritch Knight, a warrior that conjours magical weapons and wields magic to strike down their foes.
*Say you're looking for an Arcane Archer, someone with the ability to conjure a magical bow and shoot mystical arrows.
*Say you're looking for a Shade, a dark wizard that manipulates the shadows into horrible forms to torment their enemies.
*Say you're looking for an Elementist, an elemental wizard with astounding versatility.
*Say you're looking for a Totemancer, an elemental caster who specialises in summoning totems to strike foes.
*Say you're looking for a Barbarian, a primal warrior that utilises their fury to full effect.
*Say you're looking for a Shadowmancer, a dark wizard that unleashes the terrors of the shadows onto their victims.
*Say you're looking for a Shapeshifter, a warrior and master of transformation into many powerful forms.
*Say you're looking for a Beastspeaker, a mage capable of both summoning and transforming others into powerful beasts.
*Say you're looking for a Mime, a warrior that can mimic the actions of allies in battle.
*Say you're looking for a Scourge, a maniacal wizard capable of spreading plague throughout the battlefied.
*Say you're looking for a Venalguard, a cursed warrior capable of wielding two blades along with destructive jade magic.
